solution_line_template: 35 bones at the end - 10 received = <<{end_bones}-{received_bones}={bones_before_receiving}>>{bones_before_receiving} on Sunday.

Lassie ate half, so multiply by two to find the number of bones at the beginning which is {bones_before_receiving} * {multiplier_for_half} = <<{bones_before_receiving}*{multiplier_for_half}={initial_bones}>>{initial_bones} bones.
